typeSystemDescription.name: Baleen Type System - Semantics
typeSystemDescription.description:
XML definition of the Baleen type system semantic annotations.
This XML file classified as UK OFFICIAL.

typeDescription.name: uk.gov.dstl.baleen.types.semantic.Entity
typeDescription.description: Type to represent named entities - values that are assigned a semantic type.

featureDescription.name: value
featureDescription.description: A value which reflects the name of the entity. May or may not differ from underlying span from the document.

featureDescription.name: referent
featureDescription.description: Can be used to link a corefence to an entity to another (presuambly more definitive) mention of the same entity elsewhere in the text.

featureDescription.name: isNormalised
featureDescription.description: Marks the entity value as having been normalised from the original value

featureDescription.name: subType
featureDescription.description: String identifying sub type of entity.

typeDescription.name: uk.gov.dstl.baleen.types.semantic.Relation
typeDescription.description: Records a relationship between named entities, explicitly mentioned within the source document.

featureDescription.name: relationshipType
source
featureDescription.description: The source of the relationship (subject)

featureDescription.name: target
featureDescription.description: The target of the relationship (object)

featureDescription.name: value
featureDescription.description: The value of the relationship, typically the spanning text within the sentence

featureDescription.name: relationSubType
featureDescription.description: Used to record any sub-type information for the relation, for example the sub-relations defined within the ACE dataset.

typeDescription.name: uk.gov.dstl.baleen.types.semantic.Temporal
typeDescription.description: Type to record all temporal references in the text and, where possible, information about them (e.g. timestamp). This includes all times, dates, datetimes, periods, etc.

featureDescription.name: timestampStart
featureDescription.description: Timestamp of the point when the temporal reference starts (inclusive), in seconds.

featureDescription.name: timestampStop
featureDescription.description: Timestamp of the point when the temporal reference ends (exclusive), in seconds.

featureDescription.name: scope
featureDescription.description:
Does this temporal entity describe a single temporal instance (e.g. 12 Oct 2016) or a temporal range (12-16 Oct 2016). If unknown, then leave as null (or empty).
Expected values: SINGLE, RANGE, null

featureDescription.name: temporalType
featureDescription.description:
Does this temporal entity describe a date, a time or a datetime. If unknown, then leave as null (or empty).
Expected values: DATE, TIME, DATETIME, null

featureDescription.name: precision
featureDescription.description:
What level of precision does this temporal entity have. Do we know exactly when it refers to (i.e. we would expect to know timestampStart and timestampEnd); or is it relative to something else (i.e. we would expect to know timestampStart and timestampEnd only if we know when it is relative to); or is it unqualified (i.e. we would not expect to know timestampStart and timestampStop)?
If unknown, then leave as null (or empty).
Expected values: EXACT, RELATIVE, UNQUALIFIED, null

typeDescription.name: uk.gov.dstl.baleen.types.semantic.Location
typeDescription.description: A reference to a place, country, administrative region or geo-political entity within the source document. This is a general purpose type that is extended in "geo" types.

featureDescription.name: geoJson
featureDescription.description: A strnig representation of geoJson format represention of geographic information associated with the location, including where possible coordinate(s).

typeDescription.name: uk.gov.dstl.baleen.types.semantic.Event
typeDescription.description: An event relates one or more entities with an associated action.

featureDescription.name: eventType
value
featureDescription.description: A textual representation of the event, typically this may be one or more verbs from the sentence.

featureDescription.name: entities
featureDescription.description: The entities which are involved / related / associated with the event.

featureDescription.name: arguments
featureDescription.description: Additional text information, such as subject/object, in addition to the entities.

featureDescription.name: tokens
featureDescription.description: WordTokens which relate to the event type (eg verbs in the sentence)
